author: Patrick Allan
title: 30 Young Adult Books for Activists-in-Training

The earlier kids realize they can get involved with things and have the power to make a difference the better. These books, all for young people, highlight activism and resistance in their stories. This reading list, put together by YA Resists , a group of Los Angeles-based YA authors, and sponsored by PEN USA , has something for everybody. And no matter how old you are, the right story can motivate you to fight the good fight, whatever that may mean to you. Advertisement
